div.div: Any student who is enrolled in the SLV Free & Reduced Lunch Program is eligible. Families who are currently enrolled and are struggling to purchase food for their family may pick up a Safeway gift card on FRIDAY, APRIL 24, 2020 between 1:00pm and 3:00pm at the District Office/Quail Hollow Campus, 325 Marion Avenue, Ben Lomond, CA (click on this article for the full letter - ENGLISH / SPANISH)

h3.a: THE LATEST INFORMATION FROM SLVUSD - ENGLISH / ESPANOL

div.div: Please read the latest information sent by Superintendent Laurie Bruton on Friday, April 10th. (please click on this article to read)

Please check out the new web page that has been added under Instructional Services with information regarding Distance Learning and Family Resources. (please click on this article for the link to this site)
Student Nutrition Services will continue to serve breakfast / lunch over Spring Break. (please click on this article for details)

h3.a: UP-TO-DATE INFORMATION FROM SLV - April 5, 2020 - ENGLISH / ESPANOL

div.div: Please read the latest information shared by SLV Superintendent Dr. Laurie Bruton on Sunday, April 5, 2020. (please click on this article to read the parent letters)
